hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.subtitle: Your privacy is our priority. This policy explains how Plotty handles your data with complete transparency.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.content: Plotty is part of Switch-to.eu, a European initiative building privacy-first digital tools. We're committed to creating scheduling software that respects your privacy and operates under European data protection standards.

dataCollection.title: What Data We Collect
dataCollection.subtitle: We collect only the minimum data necessary to provide our scheduling service:

pollData.title: Poll Information
pollData.description: Event title, description, location, selected dates and times you provide when creating polls

participantData.title: Participant Responses
participantData.description: Names and availability selections provided by poll participants

technicalData.title: Technical Information
technicalData.description: Basic server logs for security and performance monitoring (no personal identification)

noData.title: What We Don't Collect
noData.description: No email addresses, no IP tracking, no behavioral analytics, no advertising profiles, no cookies for tracking

encryption.title: Client-Side Encryption
encryption.description: All poll data is encrypted in your browser using AES-256-GCM before transmission. We use the WebCrypto API for secure, client-side encryption.

zeroKnowledge.title: Zero-Knowledge Architecture
zeroKnowledge.description: The encryption key never reaches our servers. We cannot decrypt or access your poll content - only you and people with the poll link can view the data.

europeanServers.title: European Infrastructure
europeanServers.description: All data is stored on European servers under strict European data protection laws. Your data never leaves European jurisdiction.

security.title: Technical Security
security.description: HTTPS encryption, secure database connections, regular security updates, and minimal data retention policies.

automatic.title: Automatic Deletion
automatic.description: All poll data is automatically deleted 30 days after the event date. This includes all participant responses and poll details.

immediate.title: Immediate Deletion
immediate.description: Poll creators can delete their polls instantly at any time using the admin link.

logs.title: Technical Logs
logs.description: Anonymous server logs are retained for 7 days for security monitoring, then automatically deleted.

hosting.title: European Hosting
hosting.description: Hosted on European servers with GDPR-compliant infrastructure providers.

noTracking.title: No Third-Party Tracking
noTracking.description: We don't use Google Analytics, Facebook pixels, advertising networks, or any tracking services.

openSource.title: Open Source Dependencies
openSource.description: Built using open-source libraries that don't collect personal data.

access.title: Right to Access
access.description: You can view all your poll data through the poll and admin links.

deletion.title: Right to Deletion
deletion.description: Delete your polls instantly using the admin link, or wait for automatic deletion after 30 days.

portability.title: Data Portability
portability.description: Export your poll data as JSON through the admin interface.

noConsent.title: No Consent Required
noConsent.description: Since we use client-side encryption and don't track users, no consent is required for our minimal data processing.

noTransfers.title: Data Stays in Europe
noTransfers.description: Your encrypted data never leaves European servers. All processing occurs within the European Union under GDPR protection.

privacy.title: Privacy Questions
privacy.description: For privacy-related questions, contact us through the Switch-to.eu platform.

authority.title: Supervisory Authority
authority.description: You have the right to lodge a complaint with your local data protection authority if you have concerns about our data handling.

notification.title: How We Notify Changes
notification.description: Policy updates will be posted on this page with the revision date. Since we don't collect email addresses, we cannot notify users directly.

consent.title: Continued Use
consent.description: Continued use of Plotty after policy updates constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

summary.title: Privacy Summary
points: No accounts or email addresses required
